original_text: “As for me, Daniel, my spirit within me was anxious, and the visions of my head alarmed me.
korean_text: 나 다니엘이 중심에 근심하며 내 머리 속의 환상이 나를 번민하게 한지라

sentences.original_text: my spirit within me was anxious,
and the visions of my head alarmed me.
sentences.korean_translation: 내 머리의 이상들이 나를 놀라게 했습니다.
